title: Neville Croucher
deck:
Iâ€™m Neville. I am blessed and honoured to be married to Karen. Together we lead a Lifegroup on a Wednesday evening. I am also on the prayer and welcome teams.

I have a passion for evangelism and this has taken me off to Malawi on around a dozen occasions, where along with a team of people we work with local churches to reach out to people who do not yet know Jesus.

Family is very important to me and I now have a number of grandchildren.
